name: Colorado Heli-Ops
about: Colorado Heli-Ops, located at the Rocky Mountain Metropolitan Airport in Broomfield, Colorado, is a premier high altitude flight training school for helicopter pilots. With experienced instructors and a unique operating environment, students gain exposure to various climatic conditions, from the plains to the Rocky Mountains. The school offers a comprehensive range of courses, including Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, Instrument Rating, and Flight Instructor Rating, as well as specialized training in mountain flying and high altitude operations. Colorado Heli-Ops is distinguished by its Scenario Based Training Program and has been awarded Rotor & Wing Magazineâ€™s Editors Choice Award for flight training. Students also gain valuable experience through commercial operations such as tours, pipeline inspections, and wildlife counts. Let Colorado Heli-Ops provide you with the skills and experience to become a competent and safe helicopter pilot.
